--- title: "Preparing the Installation" date: 2022-11-03T10:57:46+01:00 weight: 22 --- In order to install the CP4WAIOPS Operator you first have to create the following resources: - Namespace - OperatorGroup - IBM Pull Secret (Entitlement) üåè Documentation for the Task: Online starter installation of CP4WAIOPS

## üöÄ TASK: Create the Namespace Create a namespace called `cp4waiops`. ### Create the namespace (project) 1. Create a namespace called `cp4waiops`, by running the following command: ``` oc create namespace cp4waiops ``` > This creates the `Namespace` in which you will install CP4WAIOPS
## üöÄ TASK: Create the Operator Group Create the `Operator Group` as described in the Documentation. ### Create the OperatorGroup 1. Create the Operator group by running the following command: ```yaml cat << EOF | oc apply -f - apiVersion: operators.coreos.com/v1 kind: OperatorGroup metadata: name: cp4waiops-operator-group namespace: cp4waiops spec: targetNamespaces: - cp4waiops EOF ``` > This creates the `OperatorGroup` needed for the Operator to deploy into the `cp4waiops` Namespace
## üöÄ TASK: Create the Pull Secret Create the `Pull Secret` as described in the Documentation with your Entitlement Key from the MyIBM Container Software Library. **Important - This step is crucial to the installation** If you don't create a secret with a valid Image Pull Token, your installation will fail. ### Create the entitlement key pull secret 1. Log in to MyIBM Container Software Library with the IBMid. 2. In the *Entitlement keys* section, select **Copy key** to copy your entitlement key to the clipboard. 3. Run the following command: ```bash oc create secret docker-registry ibm-entitlement-key \ --docker-username=cp \ --docker-password="_entitlement_key_from_step_2_" \ --docker-server=cp.icr.io \ --namespace=cp4waiops ``` Where `"_entitlement_key_from_step_2_"` is the entitlement key that you copied in the previous step. > This creates the `Secret` with your IBM Entitlement that will allow the images to be pulled from the IBM Container Registry
